Anyone calling this NTR doesn’t understand this series. They both are attracted to their own moms and confided in each other about it in one of the earlier chapters. However, they couldn’t see themselves banging their own moms yet so they made an agreement to bang each other’s moms instead. Yes, Hiroki broke the agreement and banged his mom while Mako watched. Hiroki likes his mom too as stated earlier in the series so it isn’t a surprise but was in poor taste since he didn’t tell Mako about it first. Thus he was punished in the very next chapter as Mako took both away to a Hot Springs Retreat and banged the fuck out both women while making Hiroki watch. Both MCs have been mutually cucking each other the ENTIRE series by watching their moms get fucked. There are two Main Characters. Stop acting like there’s only one. Now they have a full-blown 4-way swinging relationship, which is what the series has been building up to. This is not a NTR series, it’s a swinging series.

@Euphorism - Incest between consenting adults is legal in Japan. Apparently incestuous relationships, even father-daughter, was not taboo before WW2. The postwar era saw the west's influence make incest less and less socially acceptable. As did spreading knowledge of genetics lead to greater awareness of the dangers of inbreeding. Japan's DNA is a bit of a mess. Of course it becoming a social taboo turned it into hentai like netorare and futanari.
